short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off the plagiarism checker and AI detection for the Chegg Expert Dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chegg Expert Anti-AI

Version: 1.0
Description: This extension is designed to disable the plagiarism checker and AI detection features on the Chegg Expert Dashboard. By intercepting and modifying web requests, it helps streamline your experience on the platform. Ideal for experts looking to manage their content without interference from automated detection systems.

Key Features:

Disables plagiarism checking.
Turns off AI detection.
Seamless integration with the Chegg Expert Dashboard.
Permissions:

WebRequest and WebRequestBlocking: To intercept and modify web requests.
Storage: To store extension settings.
Tabs: To interact with browser tabs.
Access to specific Chegg domains for functionality.
Background Script: Utilizes a service worker for background operations.

Browser Action:

Includes a popup interface for easy access.
Customizable icons for different resolutions.
